name: Pills (Post-Jam)
description:
Hi! Pills is a little platformer where you can listen to your own music (o0o0o!) and eventually die from eating pills (satirical, kind of).

~*~*~*~ I N N O V A T I V E ~*~*~*~

'I found it really innovative and I liked how I could choose my own music while I played.' - Pill Eater

'It brought me and my loved ones closer.

Really nice we can listen to our own music.' - Satisfied Reviewer

 'I am excited to play this during Thanksgiving dinner with my family present.' - Dad

'Whoa, that's a lot of pills!' - Grandma

'It's a hit! Instant classic.' - Pills Fan

CONTROLS

Move : Arrow Keys

Z : Jump
